Description: Study of a bridge in an Italian town; the corner of a building in the foreground at left and a man seated on the bank of a rocky stream, beyond, the single span of a bridge with a house at right and a steep flight of steps descending Black chalk, with brown and grey-brown wash
Bibliographic references: Hind 1915-31 / Catalogue of Dutch and Flemish Drawings preserved in the Department of Prints and Drawings in the British Museum (9)
Exhibition history: 1969 Sep-Oct, Newcastle upon Tyne, Laing Art Gallery, 'The Art of Claude Lorrain', no.96 1969 Nov-Dec, London, Hayward Gallery, 'The Art of Claude Lorrain', no.150 1984, BM, Landscape in Italy, no. 57 2004-2005 Oct-Jan, Birmingham, Barber Inst of Fine Arts, 'Bartolomeus Breenbergh 'Joseph in Egypt'
